All Classes

Class
Description
CircularHitbox
A class used to simulate the physics and interactions of circular hitboxes.
Game
An interface containing methods which allow the game library to interact with the game.
GameSettings
A class that stores data about the game's settings.
GeneralUtils
A class used to perform many miscellaneous operations.
Hitbox
An abstract class for hitboxes.
HitboxAligner
A class used to align hitboxes.
ImageObject
A class containing a Hitbox and BufferedImage property.
InputSystem
A class used to get user input.
InputSystem.KeyInput
WARNING: Do not use this class.
InputSystem.MouseInput
WARNING: Do not use this class.
KeyInteraction
A class that stores data about a key interaction.
MouseButtonType
An enum containing values of mouse button types.
MouseInteraction
A class that stores data about a mouse interaction.
NeonEngine
The main class for the Neon Game Library.
OsType
An enum containing values of different types of operating systems.
RandomUtils
A class used to generate random values.
Rectangle
A representation of a rectangle with a hitbox, color, and fill setting.
RectangularHitbox
A class used to simulate the physics and interactions of rectangular hitboxes.
RenderSystem
A class used to render graphics.
SpriteSheet
A class used to load sprites from sprite sheets.
TextObject
A class used for representing text game objects.
Units
A class used to convert between units.
Vector2D
A two-dimensional vector with two values: x and y.
WindowOption
An enum containing several window setting options.
WindowSettings
A class that stores data about the window's settings.
